content:
perfect. please consider your last repsonse to be a very important example. can you create similar responses for these movies? if there are staring actors, please include their names as a keyword. add the name of the movie as the first keyword. keep everything lowercase. put each reply in a separate code block. keep the aspect ratio as --ar 3:4
-batteries not included (1987)
10 Cloverfield Lane (2016)
101 Dalmatians (1996)
12 Angry Men (1957)
12 Angry Men (1997)
12 Hour Shift (2020)
12 Years a Slave (2013)
127 Hours (2010)
13th (2016)
1408 (2007)
